Room.Name: Kista Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Kista Avenue, north of the intersection with Tower Lane.
Room.LongDescription: A shopping center and several good restaurants are along the avenue here. On the west side of the avenue you see Haxel's New Antiques next door to the Tail o' the Ox Fine Foods. On the east side of the avenue there is a custom armorsmith and a tiny restaurant specializing in Fresh Fowl and Old Wine.
